SEARCH

Class SpecialVM

java.lang.Object
SpecialVM
public class SpecialVM extends Object
This class extends the abstract class Vending Machine and represents one special vending machine

    • SpecialVM

      public SpecialVM(int numSlots, int slotCapacity)
      This constructor creates an instance of SpecialVM
      Parameters:
      numSlots - the number of slots in the special vending machine
      slotCapacity - the capacity of each slot in the special vending machine

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the String containing preparations for the customizable product

      public boolean isItemSoldSeparately(int slotIndex)
      This method returns a boolean value based on whether or not an item in a specified slot is sold separately
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the slot index of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if the item in the given slot index is sold separately, false if not

      public String processPurchase(int[] moneyInserted, int[] slotsQty)
      This method processes user purchase in a special vending machine
      Parameters:
      moneyInserted - integer array containing inserted money quantities corresponding to each money type
      slotsQty - integer array containing purchased Item quantities corresponding to each slot
      Returns:
      String containing result of purchase attempt

    • updateSlot

      public void updateSlot(int index, String name, double price, double calories, int qty)
      This method updates the information of a specified slot
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the slot to edit;
      name - the item name labeled on the slot
      price - the item price labeled on the slot
      calories - the item calories labeled on the slot
      qty - the item quantity of the slot

    • isSlotEmpty

      public boolean isSlotEmpty(int index)
      This method checks if a specific slot is empty using the slot index. It returns true if it is empty and false if it is not.
      Parameters:
      index - the slot index of the slot to check
      Returns:
      the state of the slot, true for empty and false for not empty

    • isSlotNumValid

      public boolean isSlotNumValid(int number)
      This method checks if a given slot number is valid. Valid numbers include numbers 1 to 8.
      Parameters:
      number - the given slot number
      Returns:
      true if the number is valid, false if it is not

    • createNewItem

      public boolean createNewItem(String itemName, double price, double calories, boolean isSoldAlone, String preparations)
      This method creates a new instance of Item and adds it to the pre-existing itemPool
      Parameters:
      itemName - name of new Item
      price - price of new Item
      calories - calorie count of new Item
      isSoldAlone - standalone vendability of new Item
      preparations - preparation procedure of new Item
      Returns:
      true if item creation was successful, false if not

      Parameters:

      slotIndex - slot index of Item to reprice
      Returns:
      true if repricing was successful, false if not

      Parameters:
      moneyTally - HashMap containing tally for money stored
      denominationsTally - HashMap containg tally for denominations computed or allocated
      money - ArrayList containing instances of Money objects

      Parameters:

      Returns:
